_description: Maps various service/component values to standardized canonical values. Used during ingestion to ensure consistency between runbooks and incidents.
_phase2_update: This mapping ensures that alerts and runbooks use consistent service/component values, improving retrieval accuracy.

service_aliases._description: Maps various service name variations to canonical service names

component_aliases._description: Maps various component name variations to canonical component names
component_aliases._note: null values mean the component should be removed/ignored

service_component_combinations._description: Special mappings for common service+component combinations
